txt.en: Deadly usan-kûni scorpions are gathered in Nirikal, the south-western desert of Ambarûl. They are a danger to the local population. You should slay some of the usan-kûni.
Usan-kûni, the local name for the huge scorpions that infest Ambarûl, are clustered in Nirikal.
You should slay some usan-kûni, the scorpions gathered in Nirikal, the south-western desert of Ambarûl.
